ygData.subject: Re: rivervale
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Is there any way to change this? Such as killing many of they local monsters? I play a dark elf and I d like to visit Quenos and Rivervale etc and would
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 29 Apr 1999, Grant Vanderhule wrote:

> From: Grant Vanderhule <vandergm@...>
>
> yes shadow knights are KoS in rivervale, but you CAN go in a few feet if you
> ever need to be bound there. the only way we have to go between the two main
> human cities is via highpass. if you have never been there, or are under lvl
> 20 or so, i'd reccomend you have somebody lead you thru with invis or SoW.
>
> Beld Demonblade
> Fennin Ro

Is there any way to change this? Such as killing many of they local
monsters? I play a dark elf and I'd like to visit Quenos and Rivervale etc
and would appreciate some feedback from another who has successfully
managed to do this

Thanks
Loet
CZ
